input_email_body:
Subject: Problems with Login System

Dear Customer Service, I am encountering disturbing login errors in the software. The latest server updates might be the cause of the issue. I have tried restarting the server and clearing the cache, but the problem persists My name is Omar Hassan.. Could you please assist in resolving this issue? I appreciate your support and look forward to your feedback. You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.
